articles.author: Leo Sands
articles.title: 25 dead after fire ravages nightclub in popular Indian tourism spot - The Washington Post
articles.description: Police said tourists were among those killed in the fire at Birch By Romeo Lane in Arpora. India’s coastal state of Goa is a popular destination for tourists.
articles.content:
At least 25 people were killed when a fire tore through a crowded nightclub in Indias Goa state overnight, the states chief minister, Pramod Sawant, said Sunday.
The fire broke out at Birch By Romeo… [+148 chars]

articles.author: Priyanka Shankar, News Agencies
articles.title: IndiGo chaos: Why is India’s largest airline canceling hundreds of flights? - Al Jazeera
articles.description: More than 2,000 flights cancelled, stranding thousands of passengers, as government intervenes to address the crisis.
articles.content: Air travel across India has been in chaos in the past week after the countrys largest airline, IndiGo, cancelled more than 2,000 flights starting on Friday, stranding thousands of passengers at airpo… [+8445 chars]
